summary: This is an internal FBI email chain from July 29, 2020, regarding a request for assistance from Squad C-20 (VCAC/HT) for the ongoing Epstein/Maxwell investigation. It shows the FBI's New York Field Office coordinating resources for this high-profile case.

persons.name: Sean
persons.context: Addressed in an email regarding the request for assistance on the Epstein/Maxwell investigation. Another agent proposes a call with him to provide an overview.

events.title: FBI Request for Assistance on Epstein/Maxwell Case
events.description: FBI Squad C-20 (VCAC/HT) sends an internal request for assistance related to the ongoing Epstein/Maxwell investigation, describing it as a unique opportunity on a high-profile case.

keyFacts: The FBI's New York Field Office was actively seeking assistance for the Epstein/Maxwell investigation as of July 29, 2020.
The request came from Squad C-20, which handles Violent Crimes Against Children/Human Trafficking (VCAC/HT).
The email chain indicates internal coordination among FBI agents to allocate resources to this high-profile case.
